info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:32PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fairfield, west central New Haven and eastern Putnam Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 331 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Danbury, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danbury, Shelton, Southbury, Brewster, Newtown, Ridgefield, Monroe, Bethel, Brookfield, New Fairfield, Redding, Oxford, Putnam Lake, Brewster Hill and Peach Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
